response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to you, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. I am offering you this opportunity to acquire it at a special price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value compared to the market rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
